name: Battle-Tactics
description: A React Native fully mobile strategy planning app for table-top games.
accomplishments: Co-developed all components for user flow.
Assisted with fetching data and saving to phone local storage.

name: VeriGate
description: A device created with security in mind. Verigate turns your gate operator into an IoT device, allowing you to control your gate operator by allowing who gets in.
accomplishments: Researched and developed the required hardware specs for the project.

name: GingerRed Naturals
description: GingerRed Naturals is for a Mom in Montana that had a need for a showcase of her home-made natural products for her community.
accomplishments: Assisted in research and development of new technologies.

name: Clicker Game - React
description: The rules are simple: select an image to gain a point, if you select an image that you already selected, you lose. If you select all 12 images without repeating any, you win!

name: Market-Systems v2
description: A Web App to pull and display stock market and cryptocurrency data.

name: BoyAlgo
description: This stock alert bot scans a list of your stocks for its current price and compares it to the target prices you have set. @BoyAlgo will notify you with a tweet with the details of the alert.
